text: Little Caesars is a pizza company in the United States. It is the 4th biggest pizza company in the United States. It was founded on May 8, 1959 in Garden City, Michigan by Mike Ilitch. It is a subsidiary of Ilitch Holdings, Inc. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:American fast food restaurants Category:Companies based in Detroit Category:Pizza franchises Category:1959 establishments in the United States Category:1950s establishments in Michigan
title: Little Caesars
